summary: Build a modern, professional, fully responsive marketing website for IN2 Supermart (grocery retail store in Sonipat, India) with key pages (Home, About, Categories, Offers/Deals, Contact/Visit Store), trust/value messaging, local SEO, and conversion features (WhatsApp, click-to-call, offer management).
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive build with modern stack (HTML5/CSS3/JS; optional React or WordPress)
SEO-ready semantic structure and performance optimization for fast loading
Provide a simple mechanism to update offers/banners and site content
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image: fresh Indian grocery produce spread with bright, clean premium supermarket aesthetic (in2-hero.dim_1920x900.png)
- Lifestyle image: family shopping in a neighborhood supermarket in India, warm and trustworthy tone (in2-lifestyle.dim_1600x900.png)
- Category image: Fruits & Vegetables fresh colorful produce (cat-fruits-veg.dim_800x600.png)
- Category image: Dairy & Bakery items on clean shelves (cat-dairy-bakery.dim_800x600.png)
- Category image: Packaged Foods aisle-style composition (cat-packaged-foods.dim_800x600.png)
- Category image: Household Essentials cleaning and daily-use products (cat-household.dim_800x600.png)
- Category image: Beverages & Snacks assortment (cat-beverages-snacks.dim_800x600.png)
- Category image: Personal Care products arrangement (cat-personal-care.dim_800x600.png)
- Offers banner image: bright savings/discount grocery-themed background with green/orange accents (in2-offers-banner.dim_1600x500.png)
- Small WhatsApp-style contact sticker/button background (no logo): green rounded chat bubble graphic (whatsapp-cta-bg.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a modern, professional, fully responsive multi-page website for the grocery retail store IN2 Supermart using a bright, welcoming theme (green, orange, and white) with clean typography, mobile-first layouts, and smooth but subtle UI animations.

Implement the required pages and navigation: Home, About Us, Categories, Offers & Deals, and Visit Store / Contact. Ensure navigation works on mobile (hamburger menu) and desktop (top nav), and include a footer with address and quick links.

Build the Home page sections and content: hero banner with the tagline “Fresh Groceries. Smart Prices. Near You.”; highlights for offers, daily essentials, and featured categories; quick links to shop categories; and trust indicators emphasizing quality products, affordable pricing, and local convenience.

Create an About Us page describing IN2 Supermart as a reliable local grocery destination in Sonipat, focusing on freshness, value-for-money, and customer satisfaction, with friendly-yet-professional tone.

Create a Categories page/section displaying clear category cards for: Fruits & Vegetables, Dairy & Bakery, Packaged Foods, Household Essentials, Beverages & Snacks, and Personal Care. Include relevant visuals and concise descriptive subtitles for each category.
Implement an Offers & Deals page that shows weekly promotions and a “Today’s Special Discounts” section, highlighting savings messaging aimed at families and students.

Add a “Why Choose Us” section (on Home and/or as a dedicated section on a relevant page) listing: Affordable pricing, Wide product range, Convenient neighborhood location, Friendly service, Fresh stock daily.

Create a Visit Store / Contact page that includes: an embedded Google Map (iframe embed acceptable), the full store address (No. 134 Basement, 135P, Sector 23, Sonipat, Haryana – 131001, India), store hours (Open daily, closes at 10 PM), directions prompt, and a contact number placeholder.

Add conversion CTAs site-wide: a floating WhatsApp contact button for quick inquiries and a click-to-call action (tel: link) using the phone placeholder; ensure both are accessible and do not obstruct key content on mobile.

Implement offer banner management so offers/deals content can be updated without changing frontend code: create backend data structures and API methods to list/create/update/delete offers (including fields for title, description, discount/label, start/end date, and active flag), and create a simple admin UI to manage these offers.

Protect offer management actions so only authorized store admins can modify offers: use Internet Identity authentication and restrict admin methods in the Motoko canister to an allowlist of admin principals configurable in code (initially a single placeholder admin principal).

Implement SEO-ready structure and local SEO optimization: set page titles/meta descriptions, ensure correct heading hierarchy, add structured data (LocalBusiness/GroceryStore schema) with store name and address, and include target keywords: “Supermarket in Sonipat”, “Grocery Store Sector 23 Sonipat”, “Daily Needs Store Near Me”.
Optimize performance and loading: ensure images are optimized and responsive, use lazy-loading where appropriate, minimize layout shift for hero/offer sections, and keep animations lightweight.

Add high-quality grocery and lifestyle imagery throughout the site (hero, categories, offers) using generated static assets and ensure consistent visual style aligned with a premium supermarket look and local Indian neighborhood feel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create responsive retail website UI/UX for IN2 Supermart using green/orange/white theme, clean typography, smooth animations, and local Indian premium supermarket feel

Implement required pages/sections: Home (hero tagline, offers, categories, trust indicators), About Us, Categories (listed departments), Offers & Deals, Why Choose Us, Visit Store/Contact (map, address, hours, phone placeholder)
Add conversion features: WhatsApp contact button and click-to-call
Add offer banner management capability (easy to update offers/content)
SEO-ready structure and local keyword optimization (Supermarket in Sonipat; Grocery Store Sector 23 Sonipat; Daily Needs Store Near Me) with fast loading/performance optimization
